# HUD::SET_TEXT_JUSTIFICATION

## Parameters
* **eTextJustification** justification

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Types -
0: Center-Justify
1: Left-Justify
2: Right-Justify

Right-Justify requires SET_TEXT_WRAP, otherwise it will draw to the far right of the screen
